lines.br: Agora sim, quem mataram meu besouro
lines.en: Now yes, who killed my Besouro?

lines.br: Depois de morto, besourinho cordão de ouro
lines.en: After death, little Besouro is a cord of gold

details.desc: Referring to Besouro Manganga - a famous capoeiraista, with many legends surrounding him
